settings.title: Processing Time
settings.content:
Generally, orders are processed and shipped within 1-2 business days. However, please allow up to 8 business days which an occur during high volume order periods.

All orders are shipped from New York City and delivery time is based on shipping method chosen by customer.

settings.title: Order Tracking
settings.content: You will automatically be emailed tracking once your package is shipped by our warehouse team. If you haven’t received tracking please reach out to info@onlyny.com.

settings.title: Domestic Shipping Options
settings.content: We currently offer UPS Ground, and UPS 2nd Day.

settings.title: International Shipping Options
settings.content: We currently offer USPS Priority Mail International and UPS Worldwide Expedited Shipping. Some of these services offer customers the ability to pay taxes and duties at checkout.

settings.title: International Delivery Times
settings.content: International delivery typically takes 4-10 days from date shipped. However, some international shipments can take up to 4 weeks depending on local carriers and location.

settings.title: European/UK Shipping
settings.content: Currently, none of the Only NY products are available to be delivered to Europe/UK due to legal restrictions. Please visit us at one of New York City stores.

settings.title: Missing Package
settings.content: Please allow 24 hours after the stated delivery time to contact us. Sometimes packages are scanned early or accidentally delivered to a neighbor. If your package has not been located after 24 hours, please contact us!

settings.title: Exchanges & Returns
settings.content:
Please reach out to us via our Returns page to instantly request a return.

Full priced items purchased from our site are eligible for a full refund or exchange if returned within 14 days of purchase.

For all domestic customers (within the United States), a prepaid return shipping label will be provided at no charge to return your merchandise. For all international customers, return shipping costs will not be covered.

settings.title: Collaborations/Partnerships
settings.content: Please reach out to us at info@onlyny.com with an introduction.

settings.title: Careers & Internships
settings.content: Please refer to our Careers page for available LinkedIn job postings.
